meanings.sent1: The old car judders when it starts.
meanings.sent2: The earthquake made the ground judder.
meanings.sent3: The washing machine judders like a dancing robot.
meanings.sent4: His heart judders with excitement before the race.
meanings.sent5: The thunderstorm makes the windows judder loudly.

meanings.sent1: I felt a judders in the floor during the earthquake.
meanings.sent2: The judders of the train made me feel queasy.
meanings.sent3: The judders of the roller coaster made me scream with joy.
meanings.sent4: The judders of the engine signaled a rough journey ahead.
meanings.sent5: The judders of the bridge were felt throughout the town.
